actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT l.*,upper(Title) as Campaignname,a.CAMPAIGNID
FROM DATAWAREHOUSE.DISTRIBUTION_DATA_APPLICATION.TM_API_LOG_MESSAGES l
join DATAWAREHOUSE.DISTRIBUTION_DATA_APPLICATION.TM_API_CAMPAIGNAUTOMATION a
on l.CAMPAIGNID = a.cmp_id
join  DATAWAREHOUSE.SILVERSURFER_CAMP.CAMPAIGN c
on a.CAMPAIGNID = c.CAMPAIGNID
where a.CAMPAIGNID = {{Select1.selectedOptionValue}}
and cast(l.DATERUNTIME as date) between '{{DatePicker1.formattedDate}}' and '{{DatePicker1Copy.formattedDate}}'
